participant_1.background:
I enjoy a great time at the Comic Con with my husband.
i am eighteen years old.
I don't have any pets, but I love dancing in my head.
I am not too concerned with my appearance, but I do like to look my best for my girlfriend.
My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world.

participant_2.background:
I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe.
My favorite thing to do is watch TV and admire beautiful flowers.
I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea.
I've found that reading to my baby is a great way to bond with her and help her learn new things.
I am an American who enjoys the culture of my neighbors.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well, just got home from Comic Con.
Oh cool! What was it like?
It was really fun! I got to see a lot of my favorite authors and artists.
That's awesome! I've never been to a Comic Con before.
You should definitely go! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to check it out sometime.
If you do, let me know and I can tell you some tips on how to make the most of it.
So what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, dance, and write stories.
Oh cool! I like to read too. What's your favorite book?
That's hard to say, I have a lot of favorite books. But one of my favorites is "The Catcher in the Rye" by J.D. Salinger.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good book.
